price: Au amejichukulia watoto wanawake katika vile alivyo viumba, na akakuteulieni nyinyi watoto wanaume?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ
footnotes: Ati mnadai kwamba Yeye amejitwalia katika viumbe vyake watoto wa kike, na nyinyi akakukhiarieni watoto wanaume? Ama hakika haya ni mambo ya ajabu kweli!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
